mapper.select: select attachment_no, origin_name, change_name, board_type, ref_board_no from board_attachment where ref_board_no=#{refBoardNo} order by attachment_no desc

select rownum, n.NOTICE_NO, n.NOTICE_TITLE, n.NOTICE_WRITER, n.NOTICE_ENROLL_DATE from NOTICE n where NOTICE_NO in (select NOTICE_NO from NOTICE where NOTICE_NO < #{refBoardNo}) and rownum = 1 and n.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' order by NOTICE_NO desc

select rownum, n.NOTICE_NO, n.NOTICE_TITLE, n.NOTICE_WRITER, n.NOTICE_ENROLL_DATE from NOTICE n where NOTICE_NO in (select NOTICE_NO from NOTICE where NOTICE_NO > #{refBoardNo}) and rownum = 1 and n.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' order by NOTICE_NO asc
